BNT_mote_petal.name: Mote Petal
BNT_mote_petal.memory: This must come from a very pretty flower. Oh, I can remember this now! That must be a good sign.
BNT_mote_petal.card: Gain [VAL1]% extra motes in this battle

BNT_mote_flower.name: Mote Flower
BNT_mote_flower.memory: It was a very pretty flower! And now I'll always remember it. I have to remember it.
BNT_mote_flower.card: Gain [VAL1]% extra motes in this battle

BNT_mote_garden.name: Mote Garden
BNT_mote_garden.memory: Such a beautiful garden. Have I really been seeing this every day? I can remember it now, but what if I forget it again?
BNT_mote_garden.card: Gain [VAL1]% extra motes in this battle

BNT_green_mote.name: Green Mote
BNT_green_mote.memory: Let's see, who have I met before?|L||L|Scrambla: Likes to hug|L|(Has a sister? Twins?)|L||L|Knot Knott: Wives|L|(Can't be separated)|L||L|Calorie: Scaly, spicy, and very sleepy|L||L|Unknown: Flying noodle with big hair
BNT_green_mote.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are green

BNT_red_mote.name: Red Mote
BNT_red_mote.memory: These are the Guardians I've seen.|L||L|Rendy: Big mite|L|(Loves cuddles)|L||L|Lila: Flying eyeball|L|(Loves sweet fruit)|L||L|Sandrome: Very long|L||L|Unknown: Tall screaming tree
BNT_red_mote.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are red

BNT_yellow_mote.name: Yellow Mote
BNT_yellow_mote.memory: I still don't really know how to read that well. Maybe they can help me?|L||L|Hadesoh: Warmth and fire|L|(knows some fun words)|L||L|Ombroah: Rain and water|L|Photoxai: Bright and light|L|Dendrohai: Trees and stuff|L||L|There are so many! I wonder if I'll meet a love Glyph?
BNT_yellow_mote.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are yellow

BNT_blue_mote.name: Blue Mote
BNT_blue_mote.memory: The first monster I met was a Zaramech! Lulu the little robot! Most other ones are not so little.|L||L|Sentinel 4X: Lady with mite legs|L|(Loves to ask questions)|L||L|Syncron: 4 robot bugs|L|(On high alert!)|L||L|Flip Flap: Love to sing|L|(Looks like Knot Knott. Wives?)
BNT_blue_mote.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are blue

BNT_orange_mote.name: Orange Mote
BNT_orange_mote.memory: I've seen these Glass Flora so far.|L||L|Vitrea: Very pretty|L|Glacia: Very pretty|L|(Bad at keeping secrets)|L||L|Kiwi: Cute little girl|L|(4 of them?)|L||L|Momo: Dancer|L|(Stage fright)
BNT_orange_mote.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are orange

BNT_purple_mote.name: Purple Mote
BNT_purple_mote.memory: I always know their names the instant I connect our dreams together. It's as if the name they wish to be called appears in my mind. But Veyerals don't seem to have names in the same way that other monsters do. Burning Veyeral just accepts that as her name. Voltage, Venom, Frozen, Split... they are all the same way.
BNT_purple_mote.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are purple

BNT_green_ore.name: Green Ore
BNT_green_ore.memory: I want to show you these, uh-|L|Have you ever heard of tetrids before? Normally they look like triangles, but these ones were polished into spheres. The fun thing about them is how they feel different to everyone.|L||L|What does this one feel like? It feels wet to you?
BNT_green_ore.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are green

BNT_red_ore.name: Red Ore
BNT_red_ore.memory: The reason these were rounded is because naturally shaped tetrids can be very dangerous. They have much less power in this shape, so we can play with them and see how they affect us.|L||L|What does this one feel like? Is it warm? Yeah, that is pretty common for red.
BNT_red_ore.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are red

BNT_yellow_ore.name: Yellow Ore
BNT_yellow_ore.memory: Okay, what does this one feel like? So, it feels just like a normal rock? That means one of your other senses is affected. Does it smell like anything? Uhh, try licking it then. Yeah, it's okay, just do it!|L||L|Sweet fruit? Lucky!
BNT_yellow_ore.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are yellow

BNT_blue_ore.name: Blue Ore
BNT_blue_ore.memory: I can't believe how lucky you've been so far! This one just smells minty to you? All of these have been pleasant for you.|L||L|Didn't you tell me that minty smells help you calm your anxiety? Huh, that is interesting considering this is the blue one.
BNT_blue_ore.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are blue

BNT_orange_ore.name: Orange Ore
BNT_orange_ore.memory: Finally, mild discomfort for you, hehehe!|L|That sounds like the same tingles I get from the blue one! But if it's only affecting your hand, then I bet a full tetrid wouldn't be so painful for you.|L||L|Now you're itchy? Maybe it's a little different than what I feel.
BNT_orange_ore.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are orange

BNT_purple_ore.name: Purple Ore
BNT_purple_ore.memory: Like nothing? Not even cold? Just nothing? Does it still feel like it has weight? Is there pressure if you squeeze it? I can't even begin to imagine what that feels like. I wish I could feel what you feel.
BNT_purple_ore.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|All extra motes are purple

BNT_prism_flake.name: Prism Flake
BNT_prism_flake.memory: Motes usually come in six flavors. All Zaraden can produce all six types. They shed microscopic amounts of them though their skin at all times. Those monsters though... They are on another level entirely.|L|They are fascinating!
BNT_prism_flake.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|[VAL2]% of motes are radiant

BNT_prism_shard.name: Prism Shard
BNT_prism_shard.memory: A mass of motes will bond together into regular tetrahedronal formations. When a formation reaches a certain size, any new motes will stop sticking to it. We call this fully formed mass a tetrid.|L|Usually, motes will only bond with other motes of the same color. However, radiant tetrids can be formed when all six types of motes are blended together all the way down to the molecular level.
BNT_prism_shard.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|[VAL2]% of motes are radiant

BNT_full_prism.name: Full Prism
BNT_full_prism.memory: Tetrids are our most common source of power. Obviously the miniscule amount that Zaraden produce is nowhere near enough, but luckily we have monsters that produce massive amounts of five of the six colors.|L||L|Gathering them is very dangerous and we still don't have a solution for the lack of purple motes, but that's what I was brought here to solve!
BNT_full_prism.card: Mote score +[VAL1]%|L|[VAL2]% of motes are radiant

BNT_stardust.name: Stardust
BNT_stardust.memory: My body is so soft and squishy.|L|So fragile.|L||L|Can you believe we are made of the same material as the stars?
BNT_stardust.card: All combos give radiant motes and +[VAL1]% score

BNT_shamble_sigil.name: Shamble Sigil
BNT_shamble_sigil.memory: Have you ever seen one of these out there? It's called a Shamble. It says here that they usually look like a bunch of pieces moving together. Like chunks of meat and stuff like that. Gross!|L||L|They can turn you into pieces just by looking at you! There is no way they can really do that. Something that powerful would have got you a long time ago, hehehe!

BNT_guardian_sigil.name: Guardian Sigil
BNT_guardian_sigil.memory: A Guardian is just like a big creature. Big aviocs, huge mites, and even giant hydra plants. The big mite I saw looked about as tall as you, so they're probably not as big as I thought.|L||L|Yes! I know I saw it.|L|No! If I tell you where, you're going to try looking for it! We just found this safe home for you.

BNT_glyph_sigil.name: Glyph Sigil
BNT_glyph_sigil.memory: These are living glyphs that float around. Have you seen one before? These are supposedly the things creating all those heart shaped stones you find all the time. It says here that they get really mad if you touch them, but you touch them all the time, right? Maybe they like you, hehehe!|L||L|No! Forget I said that, it was a joke!

BNT_zaramech_sigil.name: Zaramech Sigil
BNT_zaramech_sigil.memory: Now these I have seen for myself. They reprogrammed a few Zaramechs to do work over in Sentakah City. They keep them chained up... And-|L|I know that face.|L||L|I know they are just machines, but I don't like how they are treated either...

BNT_flora_sigil.name: Flora Sigil
BNT_flora_sigil.memory: Have you ever accidentally stepped on a flower made of glass? These are supposed to look and feel just like normal flowers, but remove any piece and it instantly turns into glass.|L||L|So you have seen glass petals before! But not a whole flower? This says that they have eyeballs in them. That's gross, hehehe! Did you ever see one of those?

BNT_veyeral_sigil.name: Veyeral Sigil
BNT_veyeral_sigil.memory: Your heart and my heart makes these little motes all the time. They come in 6 colors based on your mood at the time. These 5 types of monsters make a huge amount of these 5 colors, but none of them make the purple kind-|L||L|Hey, are you paying attention? You put your antenna on my heart. No wait... Uh, you don't have to move or anything.

BNT_shameful_ore.name: Shameful Ore
BNT_shameful_ore.memory: These feel very sticky to me. In fact, if they were in their natural shape, green tetrids would actually hurt me. They feel so sticky that letting them go feels like it pulls my skin off with it!|L||L|Don't ask me how I know.

BNT_enraged_ore.name: Enraged Ore
BNT_enraged_ore.memory: Red ones feel warm to me too. The thing is, they aren't actually warm at all. These are just rocks that trick you into feeling something!|L||L|But that's also the dangerous part. What if this felt like sticking your hand into fire? Your body's reaction could damage the nerves in your hand.
BNT_enraged_ore.card: Bleed [VAL1] hp on combo drops|L|Mote score +[VAL3]%

BNT_denial_ore.name: Denial Ore
BNT_denial_ore.memory: If I touch my antenna with this one, I hear a droning sound. It sounds pretty loud with full yellow tetrids, but it's not an unbearable feeling like what green or blue do to me.|L||L|It's fun to think about what this means for each of us.

BNT_anxious_ore.name: Anxious Ore
BNT_anxious_ore.memory: I was not so fortunate with blue. This round one gives my whole arm tingles, but a full blue tetrid feels like I'm being electrocuted!

BNT_fragile_ore.name: Fragile Ore
BNT_fragile_ore.memory: Now it's my turn to be the lucky one! This one tastes like sour fruit to me! It's closer to the artificial flavor like in those sour candies I gave you, so I love it even more!

BNT_lonely_ore.name: Lonely Ore
BNT_lonely_ore.memory: For me, the purple one always had a strange smell that I could never figure out. I really like the smell, but I don't know-|L|Wait...|L||L|There is no way! I can't believe this! It's been a mystery for so long!|L||L|It smells just like YOU! How is this even possible?
BNT_lonely_ore.card: Late auto panics that bleed|L|Mote score +[VAL3]%

BNT_paranoid.name: Paranoid
BNT_paranoid.memory: You really just sleep out here every night? What if a monster finds you while you're asleep? I saw a huge mite lurking around here before. I know I saw it!
BNT_paranoid.card: Panics make you bleed [VAL1] hp|L|Mote score +[VAL3]%

BNT_perceived.name: Perceived
BNT_perceived.memory: They are just mindless creatures and killing machines. There is no way to reason with them. You have to promise me, if you ever see one of those THINGS, you will run away! Promise me. No more talk of wanting to be friends with them, okay?

BNT_observed.name: Observed
BNT_observed.memory: I'm so tired of this secret. She's all I can think about. I love her so much, but she's wingless. How could we ever...? It was so cruel of me to give her that kind of hope.|L||L|Is someone watching me? Quit looking at me! Am I going insane? Who said that?!

BNT_blind_love.name: Blind Love
BNT_blind_love.memory: Helping a Zaraden get down from a tree. What would everyone think of me? But if not me, then who? And why should I care about what they think?!|L||L|...No one is looking anyways.

BNT_hard_focus.name: Hard Focus
BNT_hard_focus.memory: Kiss her face|L|Kiss her face|L|Kiss her face|L|Kiss her face|L|Kiss her face
BNT_hard_focus.card: Can't move while in focus|L|Mote score +[VAL2]%

BNT_hyperfocus.name: Hyperfocus
BNT_hyperfocus.memory: She's all I can think about anymore! Ahh! What is wrong with me?
BNT_hyperfocus.card: Can't move while in focus|L|Mote score +[VAL2]%
